sentences.en: Are you familiar with California penal code 181, Professor?
sentences.cn: 教授你可熟悉加州第181号刑事法规?

sentences.en: Environmental Crime was firstly stipulated in Penal Code of our country systematically.
sentences.cn: 我国刑法典首次对环境犯罪作了系统、具体的规定.

sentences.en: Essentially, Article 356 Of Penal Code stipulates special recidivist.
sentences.cn: 刑法典第三百五十六条实质上是关于特别累犯的规定.

sentences.en: Facilities that are located at a prison or other penal institution.
sentences.cn: 设施,分别位于一所监狱或其他惩教院所.

sentences.en: Francis Burdett succeeded in lightening the excessive severity of the penal laws.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝·伯迪脱爵士成功地减轻了极其严厉刑法时的凶杀案.

sentences.en: He underwent nineteen years of penal servitude for theft.
sentences.cn: 他因犯了大窃案受过十九年的苦刑.

sentences.en: He visited various penal institutions in the United Kingdom in the late 1930s.
sentences.cn: 20世纪30年代末他探访了英国各种各样的服刑机构。

sentences.en: I'm comparing only your ignorance and mine about penal institutions.
sentences.cn: 我只是拿你我两人对刑法机构的无知作个比较罢了.

sentences.en: If make three rated above penal code , impose death penalty.
sentences.cn: 如果犯三级以上刑法,处以死刑.

sentences.en: Inside the wall is the penal institution for the settled.
sentences.cn: 墙里面就是为那些安顿之人而设的刑所.

sentences.en: Intentional disrupt computer system, which is a crime under Chinese penal code.
sentences.cn: 故意破坏电脑系统构成中国刑法中的犯罪行为.

sentences.en: Parliament may legislate on any matter of penal law.
sentences.cn: 议会可以对刑事法律的任何事项立法.

sentences.en: Penal statutes must not be given retroactive effect.
The California Penal Code, for instance, has retained it.
sentences.cn: 比如, 《加利福尼亚刑法典》就保留了这一点.

sentences.en: The punishments for robbery and murder are prescribed in the penal code.
sentences.cn: 对抢劫和凶杀的惩罚在刑法中有明文规定.

words.tran_cn: 惩罚，处罚；使…处于严重不利地位

trans.tran_cn: 刑事的，刑法上的，与刑罚有关的，作为刑罚场所的
trans.tran_en: relating to the legal punishment of criminals, especially in prisons
